class.name: com.avnet.alapps.model.gsfc.Country
class.comment: A Country used in support of the Avnet Programming Center applications.

column.name: CREATE_DT
column.comment: The Date and Time that a row of information within this table was initially Created.

column.name: CREATE_USER_ID
column.comment: An Identifier of the User responsible for Creating a row of information within this table.

column.name: COUNTRY_ISO_ALPHA_2_CD
column.comment: An Alphabetic 2 character Code, assigned by the International Standards Organization, ISO, identifying a Country.

column.name: COUNTRY_ISO_ALPHA_3_CD
column.comment: An Alphabetic 3 character Code, assigned by the International Standards Organization, ISO, identifying a Country.

column.name: COUNTRY_ISO_NO
column.comment: A Numeric 3 digit Code, assigned by the International Standards Organization, ISO, identifying a Country.

column.name: UPDATE_DT
column.comment: The Date and Time that a row of information within this table was initially Created or Last Updated.

column.name: UPDATE_USER_ID
column.comment: An Identifier of the User responsible for Creating or Last Updating a row of information within this table.
